name: DNAPet - Ludum Jam 38
description:
Mix together DNA in a test tube. Insert it into an egg and help it incubate. Then raise the resulting creature!

Creatures have four main stats:

  • Hunger
  • Energy
  • Cleanliness
  • Exercize

The DNA you give your creature in the start affects it's rate of stat decay, as well as things like the food it can eat.


Game created for Ludum Dare 38 (jam)

Game engine: Defold
Sound effect creation: Sfxr
Music creation: BeepBox
Art creation: Mostly Paint Net

Change-log

8:40pm est - Last minute tweaks. Shortened incubation time. Adjusted need indicators to maybe be a little more clear.
